en.title: Your turnip prices

error.no_data: You have no saved turnip data!
error.no_pattern: That isn't an acceptable pattern. The acceptable patterns are:

errembed.title: Error with Turnip forecasting
errembed.description: Sorry, we can't seem to find a pattern that correlates with your turnip prices. Double check your values are correct.

large_spike.upcoming: You have a chance of a **Large Spike**! The earliest the large spike can occur is on **{} {}** with a potential maximum of **{} bells**! Check again at that time to see if you have a large spike and if not, input that day's data and I'll see if there's more possibility!
large_spike.missed:
Oh no! Seems like you missed a potential **Large Spike**! This could've happened on the **{} {}** with a potential maximum of **{} bells**! Oh no! Check and log every turnip price!
(NOTE that time travelling backwards will spoil turnips and you still won't get the large spike price.)
large_spike.done: You had and you logged your potential **Large Spike** price on **{} {}**! Congratulations for spiking to **{} bells**! Hope you sold your turnips then!

en.one_pattern: There seems to be only one pattern possible for the data you entered. Here's what you can expect from your missing values:
